Reviews.Content: experience staying late february hotel terribly staying nights looking outdoor ice rink clerk volunteered late check 2 pm opportunity breakfast 14 check close walking distance french restaurants ate wonderful crepes breakfast amount

Reviews.Title: “Great Location !”

Reviews.Content: stayed 2011 winters close university visiting nice clean heated winters bell boys front office staff friendly greet smile ofcourse parking expensive considering downtown stay

Reviews.Title: “Convenient and good if you don't have high expectations”

Reviews.Content: hotel conveniently located close metro station clean size family 3 liked pool hotel staff helpful breakfast included price hotel restaurant fine frills hotel enjoyed stay

Reviews.Title: “Great location and value for money!”

Reviews.Content: hotel located sherbrooke street minutues downtown drive mount parc royale town harbour service breakfast included issue parking expensive location hotel undergoing renovation pricier

Reviews.Title: “Small rooms, no parking, good breakfast though”

Reviews.Content: bad value renovation prefer central thermostat opposed hvac unit wallwindow tough control temperature bathroom vanity 3 feet maybe breakfast internet access pretty fast minifridge microwave flat screen tv nice pay daily parking unusual downtown montreal call ahead valet car 1015 minutes traffic bed ok spin sleeps fitness center cardio machines universal weight machine pool appears times call ahead expecting

Reviews.Title: “Stay somewhere better for the same price”
Reviews.Author: VeronicaFox
Reviews.Content: colleague stayed hotel business trip time ive stayed hotel gross wish booked holiday inn door price hotel clean considering age carpet wallpaper beds etc gross feeling circa 1980 beds serious overhaul worst marriott ive stayed stay else
